name: pr-police
description: A slack bot that reminds you of open PRs for review in your chosen repos

DAYS_TO_RUN.description: Which days of the week to run on (locale-specific), comma-separated

DEBUG.description: Debug flag to enable more verbose logging

GH_TOKEN.description: Github account token to access needed repositories

GH_REPOS.description: Repositories to watch in user/repo format, comma separated

GH_EXCLUDE_LABELS.description: Repository labels that will exclude pull requests, comma-separated. Supercedes GH_LABELS

GH_LABELS.description: Repository labels to filter pull requests, comma separated

SLACK_CHANNELS.description: Slack channels to post the announcements, comma separated. Required if SLACK_GROUPS is empty.

SLACK_GROUPS.description: Slack private groups to post the announcements, comma separated. Required if SLACK_CHANNEL is empty.

SLACK_BOT_NAME.description: The name of the bot on your slack organization

SLACK_BOT_ICON.description: URL of the bot icon to show when posting messages

TIMES_TO_RUN.description: What times of day to run (24-hour format), comma-separated

TZ.description: The timezone the server should use. Heroku default is UTC. Uses tz database timezone format. Example: 'America/Los_Angeles'
